text: Futhi ngempela sabakha ngendlela esingazange sinakhe ngayo futhi sabenzela ukuzwa (amadlebe) nokubona (amehlo) nezinhliziyo kepha akuzange kubasize ngalutho ukuzwa kwabo nokubona kwabo nezinhliziyo zabo njengoba babephika amavesi kaMvelinqangi futhi kwabazungeleza lokho ababenza ngakho inhlekisa
